pr_title: Check if file has already been ingested

timeline.message: Check if file has already been ingested
Move check into file ingest methods
Don't set retrieveStatus as a global
Check if manifest has already been deposited
Switch to using depositUUID + classname for redis key
Switch to using depositUUID + classname for redis key

timeline.bodyText: Could you change the name of the two new methods to use the "Completed" language instead of "Ingested"? And add javadoc to describe what they are for
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText:
This seems like an operation we are going to be doing in many places. It would likely make sense and save some repetition to add protected methods to the parent class for the deposit jobs, isObjectCompleted and markObjectCompleted. They can both take a PID, the parent class should already have access to the deposit id and jobStatusFactory.
The parent class can also setup the identifier used for the progress tracking field. You should be able to do something like:
String depositJobId = depositUUID + ":" + this.getClass().getName();
to get the name of the job running rather than the name of parent class.
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: this would probably be clearer as depositJobId
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.message: Add wrapper methods for "object completed" checks

timeline.bodyText: change binary to object since this isn't limited to binaries
